p: The emergence of multidrug-resistant (MDR) microorganisms represents a global challenge worldwide, since therapeutic options are limited, resulting in thousands of deaths [ 1]. Furthermore, there is a paucity of novel and effective antimicrobial agents in the pipeline, especially against carbapenem-resistant (CR) Acinetobacter baumannii and CR Enterobacteriaceae carrying enzymes other than class A carbapenemases [ 2].
